alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 9:53AM CDT until March 27 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Missouri... Little Osage River near Horton affecting Vernon County. For the Little Osage River Basin...including Fulton, Horton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Osage River near Horton. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 43.4 feet. - Forecast...The river recently crested near 43.4 feet is forecast to fall back below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 41.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 43.4 feet on 08/10/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Little Osage River Horton 41.0 43.4 Thu 8 am CDT 42.4 40.4 36.1 &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening.this evening at 1000 PM CDT.
